short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searches for chords in an Ultimate Guitar song chord page, and displays the corresponding banjo chords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you learning to play banjo and wish the website "Ultimate Guitar" included banjo chords?  Save all the time of searching for banjo chords on a separate website.  This plugin searches a chorded song page for all of the different chords used, then displays the corresponding banjo fingering in the pop-up extension window. 

Yes, there are plenty of other ways to finger each chord.  With this extension, we are just focusing on one.  Yes, that may be open for debate!   We have set up the chord fingerings for the top 100 or so banjo chords across songs we tested.  We will be adding more over time.

For use on the website: https://www.ultimate-guitar.com/  with songs of the type "Chords"
